name: Lief's Ascent
description:
Lief's Ascent

The world tree, Yggdrasil, has been poisoned by Loki, and Odin has recruited you to save the realm. Adventure through three different worlds ( Niflheim, Gnipahellir, and Valhalla), battling enemies along the way, and meeting friends to help you in your journey to reach Valhalla.

By combining two different genres (Platformer and Tactical Role Playing Game) we created a very unique experience where you get to experience some of the best parts of the games you love!
